mailSubject: Request for Missing Information - J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear [Recipient's Name],  

I hope this email finds you well. We are in the process of completing the compliance checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC, and we require additional information to finalize the review. Below are the items for which details are still pending:

1. **Company PEP Screening**:

We would appreciate it if you could provide the above information at your earliest convenience to ensure timely completion of our review process.

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,
